$WmMPID_グレイ,ch10_01_Gray_M_Normal,Face|I've known these two since we were
kids. They can hide nothing from me,
including their weaknesses.$k$p$WmMPID_ロビン,ch10_02_Robin_M_Normal,Face|All right, Alm, let's do this! I'm not
about to lose to you here! ...Wait.
...Alm? Where'd he go?$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|I can't imagine ever losing to these
two, but...this will be a nice way to
kill some time, in any case.$k$p
